means: 打算(intend的过去式和过去分词)

sentence.Network_en: The plane has been kept in service far longer than originally intended.
sentence.Network_cn: 这架飞机已经超期服役很长时间了。

sentence.Network_en: Selling was my game and I intended to be a winner.
sentence.Network_cn: 销售是我的老本行，我想做一个成功的销售者。

sentence.Network_en: His visit is intended to strengthen ties between the two countries.
sentence.Network_cn: 他此次访问旨在增进两国间的关系。

PerfectNetExp.abs: C、 多式运输提单中船名、装货港、卸货港如有"预期"（Intended）或类似意义的修饰词，银行可接受。
世界(辅助)语的道理 ... identifies 识别 intended 有意的 listener 听者.
intended是什么意思|intended的中文意思... ... intended ： 预期的 intended ： 意在 intended ： 有意的.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... intend v 打算 intended a 故意的；打算中的 intent n 意图.

list.abs: 谁有初中英语短语、... ... bother to do sth / bother doing sth. 麻烦做某事 intend to do sth / intend doing sth. 想要做某事.
求翻译:我们下周打算去度假是什么意思? 我们下周打算去度假开始翻译参考译文1: We intend to go on vacation next week 参考译文2.
什么是“无缝区域经济”-英语点津 ... 反垄断调查 anti-monopoly probe 预定轨道 intended orbit 基层选举 grassroots election.
I intend a complete ascension in this lifetime ., 我意愿此生完全提升.

means.word_mean: 有目的的,考虑的,设计的

entry.tran: 打算中的;预期的;预定的
entry.def: You use intended to describe the thing you are trying to achieve or person you are trying to affect.

example.ex: The intended target had been a military building...
example.tran: 原定目标是一座军事大楼。

example.ex: Keith hoped the obvious sarcasm would have its intended effect...
example.tran: 基思希望这一明显的讽刺能达到预期的效果。

auth_sentence.content: The six deny they intended to kidnap the children.
auth_sentence.res_content: The six deny they intended to kidnap the children.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The six deny they intended to kidnap the children.

auth_sentence.content: This is not intended to be the naughty column.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is not intended to be the naughty column.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is not intended to be the naughty column.

auth_sentence.content: Her death was "neither predicted nor intended".
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Her death was "neither predicted nor intended".

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有意的, 故意的, 已经订婚的
stems_affixes.word_buile: intend[v.想要,打算,企图]+ed……的→adj.有意的, 故意的, 已经订婚的 n.已经订婚者
intend[[v.想要,打算,企图]]拿省鷄dj.目不转睛的,热切的 n.意图

stems_affixes.value_cn: 嫩的, 温柔的, 软弱的
stems_affixes.word_buile: tend伸展,趋向+er→像伸出的幼芽→嫩的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 出席, 出席的人数, 伺候, 照料
stems_affixes.word_buile: attend[v.出席,参加]+ance表名词→n.出席, 出席的人数, 伺候, 照料
attend[v.出席,参加]+ant人→n.服务员;随从,随员
intend[v.想要,打算,企图]+ed……的→adj.有意的, 故意的, 已经订婚的 n.已经订婚者
intend[[v.想要,打算,企图]]拿省鷄dj.目不转睛的,热切的 n.意图
tend趋向+ency表名词→n.趋势,趋向;倾向
at加强+tend伸展,趋向→伸出去→出席
con一起+tend伸展,趋向→一起伸展→竞争,斗争

stems_affixes.value_cn: 延长,延伸;扩充;给予;提供;估价
stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出+tend伸展,趋向→伸出去→扩张
in内+tend伸展,趋向→内心伸出→想要

stems_affixes.value_cn: 假装,假托,借口,[在演戏中]装扮
stems_affixes.word_buile: pre预先,提前+tend伸展,趋向→提前展开,事先展开→假装,借口
pro前+tend伸展,趋向→v.[使]伸出, [使]伸展

stems_affixes.value_cn: 趋向,往往是;易于,往往会;照料,看护
stems_affixes.word_buile: tend伸展,趋向→趋向做→易于,往往会

Sentence.sentence: Worldwide people speak differently from the way they write, and texting -quick, casual and only intended to be read once — is actually a way of talking with your fingers.
Many professors think that giving out Apple iPhones or Internet-capable iPods to students may not benefit education as intended.
may not benefit education as intended
